home.intro: Software Engineer passionate about automation and technological innovation, specializing in web development, IT systems management, and cloud technologies.

iptvManagementSystem.name: IPTV User Management System
iptvManagementSystem.description: A CRUD system to manage users of an IPTV platform, with expiration date alerts.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.ineDescription: Responsible for managing access, permissions, incidents, and user requests in various provincial locations, using Helpdesk platforms to generate requests, complying with the SLA agreements established by the institution under ITIL practices, ensuring IT service management through records, implementation, analysis, and documentation.
experience.tallerDescription: Collaboration in team to develop dynamic and responsive websites using WordPress and PHP for creating and modifying templates with custom fields through FTP or SSH server connection.
experience.ccDescription: Responsible for creating users and corporate emails in Mailrelay, Moodle administration, and hosting configurations in cPanel.
experience.zekeDescription: 24/7 monitoring of services in Nagios, incident and request management in GLPI, and use of Oracle SQL Developer and Putty for database and server administration.
experience.andresBelloDescription: Management and administration of intranet, data upload to REUF (SENCE), and coordination of instructors and payroll in training courses.
